PositionHistory.Title: Global Engagement Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Organization: HCL Technologies Designation: Global Engagement Manager June 2014- Present • Part of 2-member Corporate Strategy/Planning team at CEOs office • Participate in Annual budgeting, Financial Planning exercise • Competitor benchmarking Analysis to see areas of improvement and opportunities • Portfolio Analysis of Different Businesses and decide on Go-No Go decision • Analyze Monthly and Weekly P&L Reports and question Business on discrepancies • Track revenue from Deals recently signed with BFC, Sales and Delivery Units • Rationalization and tracking of overheads and investment for different Businesses Key • Perform M&A Valuation of Potential Inorganic Opportunities and advise CEO on the same Responsibilities • Create Quarterly/Annual Board Presentation and Monthly updates for CEO • Look for potential Cost cutting measures to protect/Enhance the bottom line • Act as interface of CEO with Finance and Business • Analyze Financial Reports of Potential Clients • Preparation and Tracking of KPP of Leaders (VP and above) • Forecasting Headcount for Organization in line with growth and Utilization • Prepare Information Memorandum for Potential Investors • Advise and assist CEO in important decisions related to Finance

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Subject Matter Expert
PositionHistory.Description: Organization: AMDOCS DVCI Designation: Senior Subject Matter Expert Jul, 2008 - May 2012 • Client Facing experience at TELUS Vancouver for 5 months and MTEL Bulgaria for 1 Month • Led, Mentored & supervised team of 5 SMEs in application knowledge and project delivery Key • Worked with clients and people across Geographies - US, Canada, Bulgaria, Ireland, Israel Responsibilities • Interfaced with clients (AT&T, TELUS) to gather requirements and propose High level solutions • Managed Interfaces of OMS with CRM, Account Payables, Receivables, collections etc. • Selected by Client Manager to represent offshore Team (size 25) at Canada and Bulgaria Achievements • Awarded with "Distinguished Mentor Job" at AMDOCS in the year 2011

PositionHistory.Title: Summer Internship
PositionHistory.Description: Summer Internship Organization: Idea Cellular Department: Service Delivery April, 2013 - June, 2013 Project: Improving Service Delivery process at MyIdeas through Benchmarking against competitors • Identified the Service Delivery elements to be Benchmarked and assigned weightages • Built a framework to rate MyIdeas centers vis-à-vis competitors across zones Project Details • Prepared questionnaires and interviewed CREs, store owners and customers across 120 stores • Used statistical analysis to draw references and make comparisons to identify lags and leads • Identified performance gaps and recommended feasible and out of box solutions • Select recommendations were implemented on a pilot basis across 4 zones in Mumbai Achievements • Appreciated by Service Delivery head (Postpaid) for excellent insights /recommendations

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: SATYAJIT MAHAPATRO's experience appears to be concentrated in Finance / Other, with exposure to Sales / General. SATYAJIT MAHAPATRO has 5 years of work experience, with little or no management experience.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a mid-level management role: Global Engagement Manager Starting on 6/1/2014, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 13 months: Title: Global Engagement Manager for HCL Technologies
